attributes.action: Allow women who are of pensionable age to receive a basic pension even if their husband is younger than them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women who have husbands younger than them are unable to collect a state pension, even if they have paid their contributions  to it until their husband is at pensionable age. For example a woman aged 65 who has a husband aged 61 cannot claim a pension until she is 69 years old when her younger husband reaches 65. This is discrimination and a disgrace.
